about_the_game:
Welcome to Paintballers : MLPB 2024, the groundbreaking cross-platform video game meticulously designed by professional paintball players.
Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-fueled action, realistic environments, and strategic gameplay.
Whether you're a seasoned enthusiast or a newcomer, Paintballers delivers an authentic and thrilling paintball experience like never before.

Paintballers : MLPB 2024 offers you :
- Online 5v5 matches in first person
- Speedball, woodball and other game formats
- Training mode to learn the real fields
- A realistic movement system with 100% editable controls
- Realistic paintball physics (Velocity, bounces, accuracy, etc.)
- World ranking and stats system
- Possibility to host your own games via listen and dedicated servers
- A free to play experience

The game will be updated weekly with new content (fields, gears, equipments).

name: Paintballers : Major League Paintball MLPB 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i3, Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5, Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
